TEXT.English: National Theatre
TEXT.German: National Theatre
TEXT.Italian: National Theatre
TEXT.Spanish: National Theatre

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] increases the cultural output of the city as well as increasing the city's happiness. It increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]théâtre nationale[COLOR_REVERT] augmente la production culturelle et le bonheur de la ville. Il augmente aussi les chances d'apparition d'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]artiste illustre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] increases the cultural output of the city as well as increasing the city's happiness. It increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] increases the cultural output of the city as well as increasing the city's happiness. It increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] increases the cultural output of the city as well as increasing the city's happiness. It increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: National Gallery
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Gallery[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its city's cultural output and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]galerie nationale[COLOR_REVERT] double la production culturelle de sa ville et augmente les chances d'apparition d'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]artiste illustre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nationalgalerie[COLOR_REVERT] verdoppelt den kulturellen Ausstoß einer Stadt. Außerdem erhöht es die Chancen einer Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Künstler[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Gallery[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its city's cultural output and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Gallery[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its city's cultural output and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Park[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the health in your city. It also provides a free specialist for each [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Forest Preserve[COLOR_REVERT] in its city radius and increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]parc national[COLOR_REVERT] améliore grandement la santé de la ville. Il fournit aussi un spécialiste gratuit par [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]réserve naturelle[COLOR_REVERT] dans les environs de la ville et augmente les chances d'apparition d'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]savant illustre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Park[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the health in your city. It also provides a free specialist for each [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Forest Preserve[COLOR_REVERT] in its city radius and increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Park[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the health in your city. It also provides a free specialist for each [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Forest Preserve[COLOR_REVERT] in its city radius and increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Park[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the health in your city. It also provides a free specialist for each [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Forest Preserve[COLOR_REVERT] in its city radius and increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Secret Service
TEXT.German: Secret Service
TEXT.Italian: Secret Service
TEXT.Spanish: Secret Service

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Secret Service[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's espionage output and gives experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Espionage Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in it's city.
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]service secret[COLOR_REVERT] augmente la production d'espionnage de la ville et donne des points d'expérience aux [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]unités d'espionnage[COLOR_REVERT] qui y sont formées.
TEXT.German: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Secret Service[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's espionage output and gives experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Espionage Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in it's city.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Secret Service[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's espionage output and gives experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Espionage Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in it's city.
TEXT.Spanish: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Secret Service[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's espionage output and gives experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Espionage Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in it's city.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Cross[COLOR_REVERT] gives all units built in its city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Medic I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion, and it increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Croix-Rouge[COLOR_REVERT] attribue à toutes les unités formée dans la ville une promotion de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Infirmier I[COLOR_REVERT] et augmente les chances d'apparition d'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]savant illustre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Hat eine Stadt das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Rote Kreuz[COLOR_REVERT], erhalten alle dort gebauten Einheiten die Beförderung [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sanitäter I[COLOR_REVERT]. Darüber hinaus erhöhen sich die Chancen der Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Wissenschaftler[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Croce Rossa[COLOR_REVERT] dona a tutte le unità realizzate nella città la promozione [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Medico I[COLOR_REVERT] e aumenta la probabilità di generare un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grande Scienziato[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cruz Roja[COLOR_REVERT] otorga el ascenso de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Médica I[COLOR_REVERT] a todas las unidades que se construyan en su ciudad y aumenta las posibilidades de que ésta genere un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gran científico[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Trading Company

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trading Company[COLOR_REVERT] generates income for each city that Trading Company has spread to and provides two trade routes. It generates health for its city with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] and happiness for its city with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tea[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tobacco[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]compagnie commerciale[COLOR_REVERT] génère un revenu pour chaque ville où s'est propagée la Compagnie commerciale. Elle procure de la santé si sa ville a accès à des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]épices[COLOR_REVERT], et du bonheur si sa ville a accès à du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]café[COLOR_REVERT], du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]sucre[COLOR_REVERT], du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]thé[COLOR_REVERT] ou du [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]tabac[COLOR_REVERT]. Elle augmente aussi les chances d'apparition d'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]marchand illustre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trading Company[COLOR_REVERT] generates income for each city that Trading Company has spread to and provides two trade routes. It generates health for its city with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] and happiness for its city with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tea[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tobacco[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trading Company[COLOR_REVERT] generates income for each city that Trading Company has spread to and provides two trade routes. It generates health for its city with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] and happiness for its city with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tea[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tobacco[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trading Company[COLOR_REVERT] generates income for each city that Trading Company has spread to and provides two trade routes. It generates health for its city with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] and happiness for its city with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tea[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tobacco[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Stock Exchange
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stock Exchange[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's production of wealth.
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]bourse[COLOR_REVERT] augmente la production de richesse d'une ville.
TEXT.German: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stock Exchange[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's production of wealth.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stock Exchange[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's production of wealth.
TEXT.Spanish: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stock Exchange[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's production of wealth.

TEXT.English: Ironworks

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ironworks[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's production if that city has access to coal and/or iron, but also adds unhealthiness. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]usine sidérurgique[COLOR_REVERT] augmente la production d'une ville si celle-ci dispose de charbon ou de fer, mais aux dépens de la santé des habitants. Elle augmente les chances d'apparition d'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ingénieur illustre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eisenverarbeitung[COLOR_REVERT] steigert in Städten mit Zugriff auf Kohle und/oder Eisen die Produktion, wirkt sich aber negativ auf die Gesundheit der Bevölkerung aus. Darüber hinaus erhöht sie die Chancen der Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Ingenieur[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ferrieria[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la produzione della città se ha accesso a carbone e/o ferro, ma genera infelicità. Inoltre, aumenta la probabilità di generare un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grande Ingegnere[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Metalurgia[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta la producción de la ciudad si ésta tiene acceso a carbón o hierro, pero también aumenta su insalubridad. Incrementa también las posibilidades de que en su ciudad se genere un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gran ingeniero[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Manufactory
TEXT.German: Manufactory
TEXT.Italian: Manufactory
TEXT.Spanish: Manufactory

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Manufactories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's production and increase trade route yield.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]manufactures[COLOR_REVERT] augmentent la production d'une ville et le rendement de ses routes commerciales.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Manufactories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's production and increase trade route yield.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Manufactories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's production and increase trade route yield.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Manufactories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's production and increase trade route yield.

TEXT.English: Museum
TEXT.German: Museum
TEXT.Italian: Museum
TEXT.Spanish: Museum

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Musea[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increase a city's cultural output. They also increase a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate depending on the culture level.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]musées[COLOR_REVERT] augmentent nettement la production culturelle d'une ville. Ils augmentent aussi le taux de natalité des [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]personnages illustres[COLOR_REVERT] selon le niveau de culture de la ville.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Musea[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increase a city's cultural output. They also increase a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate depending on the culture level.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Musea[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increase a city's cultural output. They also increase a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate depending on the culture level.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Musea[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increase a city's cultural output. They also increase a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate depending on the culture level.

TEXT.English: Armoury
TEXT.German: Armoury
TEXT.Italian: Armoury
TEXT.Spanish: Armoury

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Armouries[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's military unit production.
TEXT.French: Les [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]arsenaux[COLOR_REVERT] accélèrent la production d'unités militaires d'une ville.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Armouries[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's military unit production.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Armouries[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's military unit production.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Armouries[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's military unit production.

TEXT.English: National College
TEXT.German: Nationale Hochschule
TEXT.Italian: Collegio nazionale
TEXT.Spanish: Colegio nacional

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National College[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the scientific output of its city. It also allows you to change three citizens into scientists and increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]collège national[COLOR_REVERT] augmente nettement la production scientifique de la ville qui l'abrite. Elle permet aussi de transformer 3 citoyens en scientifiques et augmente les chances d'apparition d'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]savant illustre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nationale Hochschule[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht den Forschungsausstoß einer Stadt und erhöht die Chance, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Wissenschaftler[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen. Darüber hinaus können Sie drei Bürger in Wissenschaftler verwandeln.
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Collegio nazionale[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta notevolmente la produzione scientifica della città. Inoltre, permette di trasformare tre cittadini in scienziati e aumenta la probabilità di generare un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grande Scienziato[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colegio nacional[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta enormemente la producción científica de la ciudad. También permite convertir a tres ciudadanos en científicos y aumenta las posibilidades de que en su ciudad se genere un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gran científico[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: National Monument
TEXT.German: Nationalmonument
TEXT.Italian: Monumento nazionale
TEXT.Spanish: Monumento Nacional

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Monument[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the rate at which its city produces [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great People[COLOR_REVERT], particularly [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artists[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]monument national[COLOR_REVERT] augmente nettement les chances d'apparition de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]personnages illustres[COLOR_REVERT] dans la ville, notamment des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]artistes illustres[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nationalmonument[COLOR_REVERT] beschleunigt in einer Stadt die Bildung [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Großer Persönlichkeiten[COLOR_REVERT] (vor allem [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Große Künstler[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.Italian: Il [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monumento nazionale[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta notevolmente il ritmo di realizzazione dei [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grandi Personaggi[COLOR_REVERT], in particolare dei [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grandi Artisti[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monumento Nacional[COLOR_REVERT] aumenta mucho el ritmo al que la ciudad produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grandes personajes[COLOR_REVERT], en especial [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grandes artistas[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Military Academy
TEXT.German: Military Academy
TEXT.Italian: Military Academy
TEXT.Spanish: Military Academy

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Academy[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's military unit production, grants the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leadership[COLOR_REVERT] promotion to all units and increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]école militaire[COLOR_REVERT] accélère la production d'unités militaires de la ville, confère la promotion [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Commandement[COLOR_REVERT] à toutes les unités qui y sont formées, et augmente les chances d'apparition d'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]homme d'État illustre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Academy[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's military unit production, grants the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leadership[COLOR_REVERT] promotion to all units and increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Academy[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's military unit production, grants the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leadership[COLOR_REVERT] promotion to all units and increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Academy[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's military unit production, grants the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leadership[COLOR_REVERT] promotion to all units and increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Central Bank
TEXT.German: Zentralbank
TEXT.Italian: Banca centrale
TEXT.Spanish: Banco Central

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Central Bank[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its city's wealth output and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]banque centrale[COLOR_REVERT] double la production de richesse de la ville et augmente les chances d'apparition d'un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]marchand illustre[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zentralbank[COLOR_REVERT] verdoppelt die Wohlstandsproduktion einer Stadt und erhöht die Chance, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Händler[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.
TEXT.Italian: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Banca centrale[COLOR_REVERT] raddoppia la produzione di ricchezza della città e aumenta le probabilità di generare un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grande Mercante[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: El [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Banco Central[COLOR_REVERT] dobla la producción de riqueza de su ciudad y aumenta las posibilidades de que ésta genere un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gran mercader[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Spaceport
TEXT.German: Raumhafen
TEXT.Italian: Spaceport
TEXT.Spanish: Spaceport

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Spaceport[COLOR_REVERT] increases spaceship production in all cities and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Spaceport[COLOR_REVERT] increases spaceship production in all cities and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Spaceport[COLOR_REVERT] increases spaceship production in all cities and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Spaceport[COLOR_REVERT] increases spaceship production in all cities and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Spaceport[COLOR_REVERT] increases spaceship production in all cities and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
